servinfo.title: Vehicle pulls to one side during straight driving

condition.ptxt: Vehicle pulls to one side during straight driving

ps.ptxt: Low or uneven tire inflation pressure

action.ptxt: Inflate tires to proper pressure or adjust right and left tires inflation pressure.

ps.ptxt: Front end alignment out of order

action.ptxt: Check and adjust front end alignment.

ps.ptxt: Rear end alignment out of order

action.ptxt: Check and adjust rear end alignment.

ps.ptxt: Malfunction of control valve in gear case
